cab.content: om Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,30th October 1919.(Repeated Constantinople wider No. 77213.)(Received 31st, 10.15 a.m.)14713. 29th. October. Malleson wires 27th October :-" My Daragaz agent wires to-day : ' Afghans from various directions are, approaching Merv. It is not known what their intention is. Seven troop trains withtroops and artillery passed through Artik 26th October towards Merv.' "fir
